## SparseMatrix.getRow() method

Returns a vector corresponding to the row at index `rowIndex`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRow(i: number): Vector<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  i | <code>number</code> | The index for which to fetch the row |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector<S>`

The row vector
